summary: Tired of Frost being murdered by giants or dragons well, *in Professor Farnsworths voice* Good news everyone
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]
           [img]https://67.media.tumblr.com/4b5b9a5db505e50218b96ee6f9a36986/tumblr_o8xlfkJPGu1raiwpfo4_1280.png[/img]
                                   I mean I guess I will?
                     [/size][size=3](Still even if I don't, don't steal it I will DMCA the f*** out of you)[/size]


[b]About:[/b]

Tired of Frost being murdered by giants or dragons well,

*[i]in Professor Farnsworth's voice[/i]* [color=#00ff00][size=5][u][i][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T2BNmn8TYdE]Good news everyone![/url][/i][/u][/size][/color]

This little ass mod makes everyones favorite horse essential! So no longer will he be violently and brutally murdered by dragons, giants or [i][s]you[/s][/i].

I made this while testing the Creation kit, so it's nothing big.

[b][u][size=5]Tools Used:[/size][/u][/b]

- The Creation Kit
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url]


[u][b][size=5]Permissions:[/size][/b][/u]

- [b][i][size=4]You do not have permission to reupload to here, the Nexus, or anywhere without My explicit permission, if you want to use this in a compilation pack, ask Me first as well.[/size][/i][/b]




[u][b][size=5]Credits:[/size][/b][/u]

- Me, for wasting too much time on this..
- Bethesda Softworks(for making the game)
- Xbone/PS4 Console Sticker is by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/25912980/?]yevvie[/url]


[size=5][b][u]Finale Note: [/u][/b][/size]


- This mod uses only vanilla assets found in the Skyrim BSAs.
- If you have any questions, feel free to send Me a message on here the Nexus or on Tumblr(I am on there everyday) 

[size=3][url=http://fallenfromfirmament.tumblr.com/]My Tumblr[/url][/size]
I really hope you enjoy My mod! Have fun. :)
author: LordGermanicus666
